title: Demo: Reduce Latency 10x by Geo-Partitioning Your Data
description:
Running a geographically distributed database has a lot of benefits. We see enterprise companies, startups, and students choose distributed dbs for reliability, scalability, and even security. But many distributed databases come at a serious cost: latency. Distributing nodes across the globe means your data will need to travel from one node to the other. By its very definition, distribution creates latency. 
Geo-partitioning your data in CockroachDB makes it easy to minimize that latency.
